attributes.action: Allow School Sports Days and other outdoor school events to go ahead.
attributes.additional_details: Either shut down these massive events, or give schools the go ahead to follow suit. It needs to be equal. Parents are sick of sacrificing their children with no end in sight.
attributes.background: 12000 people can gather, daily, at Ascot, 60000 + at Wembley. Why can’t parents go see their children at sports or graduation days? We have missed events that will never repeat. Horses will race again. Footballers will play again. Our children only grow once. The disparity in rules is disgusting.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individual schools.

The Department for Education have confirmed that there is no legal bar on spectators attending, providing that legal limits on outdoor gatherings and groups are followed:

https://dfemedia.blog.gov.uk/2021/06/18/can-sports-days-go-ahead-and-will-i-be-able-to-attend-we-answer-your-questions/
